body_html: @dmitry-xnor now to think of it, I could probably drop such binaries into a public shared folder as well, as I'm going through my build process. I'm building with --config=opt --config=cuda with CUDA 8.0 on Intel(R) Xeon(R) CPU E5-2630 v3 @ 2.40GHz from Cirrascale which seems like a common configuration. The downside is that I don't have time to setup cloud storage/ research uploading, but if someone gave me an easy recipe to follow, I could do that.

body: @dmitry-xnor now to think of it, I could probably drop such binaries into a public shared folder as well, as I'm going through my build process. I'm building with `--config=opt --config=cuda` with CUDA 8.0 on `Intel(R) Xeon(R) CPU E5-2630 v3 @ 2.40GHz` from Cirrascale which seems like a common configuration. The downside is that I don't have time to setup cloud storage/ research uploading, but if someone gave me an easy recipe to follow, I could do that.
